name: ProductAndSkuIds
description:
Retrieves the IDs of products and SKUs. 
> ðŸ“˜ Onboarding guide 
>
> Check the new [Catalog onboarding guide](https://developers.vtex.com/vtex-rest-api/docs/catalog-overview). We created this guide to improve the onboarding experience for developers at VTEX. It assembles all documentation on our Developer Portal about Catalog and is organized by focusing on the developer's journey.

categoryId.description: ID of the category from which you need to retrieve Products and SKUs.

_from.description: Insert the ID that will start the request result.

_to.description: Insert the ID that will end the request result.

Content-Type.description: Describes the type of the content being sent.

Accept.description: HTTP Client Negotiation _Accept_ Header. Indicates the types of responses the client can understand.

$ul: **data**: Object composed by Product IDs and SKU IDs, where the parent ID is from Products and the SKU IDs are the Child IDs.
**Product ID**: Array with SKU IDs of a certain product.
**range**: Object with information about the product and SKUs list.
